meanings.sent1: The mazers explored the maze with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The mazers in the group were skilled at navigating through the maze.
meanings.sent3: The mazers decided to challenge each other to a maze race.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of life, we are all mazers trying to find our way.
meanings.sent5: The mazers wore special hats to stand out in the maze.

meanings.sent1: She poured the juice into the mazers for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a collection of beautiful mazers on display.
meanings.sent3: The mazers clinked together in a cheerful toast.
meanings.sent4: The mazers gleamed under the sunlight, reflecting their intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The mazers were passed around the table during the feast.

meanings.definition: Plural of mazer, a type of drinking vessel.
meanings.sent1: The guests admired the elegant mazers on the dining table.
meanings.sent2: The mazers were carefully crafted with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The mazers were used to serve the special drink at the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The mazers symbolized unity as they were passed around the circle.
meanings.sent5: The mazers were cherished heirlooms passed down through generations.
